post.title: how do i get to the cooling fans in my plasma to get the dust out?
post.content: the cooling fans in my panny plasma are thick with dust. although i regularly vacuum the grills, i can't get to the fans themselves. can i safely get to them and give them a vacuum by taking the screws off at the back, or is this not advisable? is there another way to do it? thanks in advance for your help
